00033 /* Big thanks to David DeLong's code over at http://github.com/davedelong/DDHotKey - this function is the same as his own (minus personal coding style)
00034  * Without studying that I'd have been unable to have implemented this class (as simplistic as it is!)
00035  */
00036 
00037 NSUInteger translateModifierFlags(NSUInteger oldFlags){
00038         NSUInteger newFlags = 0;
00039         if( ( oldFlags & NSControlKeyMask ) > 0 )       newFlags |= controlKey;
00040         if( ( oldFlags & NSCommandKeyMask ) > 0 )       newFlags |= cmdKey;
00041         if( ( oldFlags & NSShiftKeyMask ) > 0 )         newFlags |= shiftKey;
00042         if( ( oldFlags & NSAlternateKeyMask ) > 0 )     newFlags |= optionKey;
00043         return newFlags;
00044 }
